content: **knitted shawl/scarf for children in drops sky the piece is worked sideways in garter stitch ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern skip-024-bn yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **size** height down middle approx 12 cm width along top approx 77 cm **yarn** drops sky from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50 g colour 19 peach **needles** drops circular needle size 4 mm length 40 cm **knitting gauge ** 21 stitches in width and 42 row in height with garter stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
